item.title: The Twelve-Factor App
item.description: Mailchimp Facts Year of launch: 2001 Total number of Mailchimp users: 14 millions * 30 Number of emails sent through Mailchimp daily: 1 billion Average number of Mailchimp API requests daily: 10 million Number of countries MailChimp has users in: 200 countries There are two types of panel in mailchimp - Dashboard panel: - Email template designer - Add your contant list - Generate subscriber form - create campaign
